docs.text: Learnings are stored here Store the technical know hows of the studysSSH known hosts This is how you write Linux commands, YAML, Python, Go , etc. Step 7: Full example (COPY THIS) Paste this into ssh-known-hosts.md : ```md SSH known_hosts What is it? known_hosts is a file used by SSH to store server fingerprints. Why is it needed? Prevents man-in-the-middle attacks Ensures you connect to the same server Protects against fake servers Common commands ```bash ssh user@server ssh-keygen -R hostname
